plot: Documentary which takes a look at the social similarities and differences between teenagers of Russia and those in the United States rooted in the music and influence of shock-rocker Marilyn Manson.
title: Rushing Through: LA to Moscow
plot_es: Documentary which takes a look at the social similarities and differences between teenagers of Russia and those in the United States rooted in the music and influence of shock-rocker Marilyn Manson.
plot_en: Documentary which takes a look at the social similarities and differences between teenagers of Russia and those in the United States rooted in the music and influence of shock-rocker Marilyn Manson.
